author: jim
msg: Updates docs w/ transforms. Use Andre's patch to lib/DocUtil.pm
to work around some OS X issues which mangled paths

author: andreask
msg: Fixed bug in setUp causing it to only start server when running in embedded mode. Removed import of ..functionalTests.util package.

author: thorsten
msg: Adding explanation of the Access Control Specification. Further explaining how it works with an example. Since the order of the policy is important I changed all set and maps to Linked* to keep the entry order.

author: imario
msg: allow to embed content in script tag. This allows you to use
<h:outputText in your scriptlet - e.g. access to bean values through el
